title: A Musical Heritage Knowledge Graph
subtitle: Exploring Bologna's role in music history through Knowledge Extraction
description: The MusicBO Knowledge Graph (KG), documenting Bologna's pivotal role in the European Musical Heritage, is created using an automated Text-to-Knowledge Graph pipeline on a multilingual and diachronic corpus.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT ?label (count(distinct ?s) as ?count)  
WHERE {?s rdf:type ?class; <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/name> ?name   
FILTER regex(str(?class), "(?:^http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/)")      BIND (REPLACE(STR(?class), "^.+?([^/#]+)$", "$1") as ?label)} 
GROUP BY ?label   
ORDER BY DESC (?count) 
LIMIT 10

dynamic_elements.text: We analysed MusicBO corpus through the lens of Named Entities Recognition (NER), a standard Natural Language Processing task. We discovered that the entanglement of Bologna and music history is a composite network of people, places, and organizations. Publications, works of art and books are frequently mentioned in the corpus, revealing that Bologna was an important centre for artistic production.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>  
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  
SELECT distinct ?label (count(distinct ?s) as ?count)  
WHERE {?s rdf:type <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Person> . ?frameInstance ?p ?s ; rdf:type ?frame . ?frame rdfs:label ?label }  
GROUP BY ?label  
ORDER BY DESC(?count) 
LIMIT 10

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  
PREFIX dul: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/dul/DUL.owl#>    
SELECT ?label (count(distinct ?frameInstance) as ?count)  
WHERE {?s rdf:type <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Person> . ?frameInstance ?p ?s ; rdf:type ?frame . ?frame rdfs:label ?frameLabel . ?frame rdfs:subClassOf dul:Event .   
?s <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/name> ?label  
FILTER (!regex(str(?s), "san_petronio",'i'))}  
   
GROUP BY ?label   
ORDER BY DESC (?count)
LIMIT 10

dynamic_elements.text: Among the many people in the MusicBO corpus, Rossini is the most frequently mentioned as involved in events and situations.

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Top 10 roles played by people in different types of situations
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT distinct ?label (count(distinct ?s) as ?count) 
WHERE {?s rdf:type <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Person> . ?frameInstance ?p ?s ; rdf:type ?frame . 
#?frame rdfs:label ?label  
BIND (REPLACE(STR(?p), "^.*/([^/]*)$", "$1") as ?label)  
FILTER (!regex(str(?p), "entity_"))  
FILTER (!regex(str(?p), "#"))  
FILTER (!regex(str(?p), "subset")) }  
GROUP BY ?label  
ORDER BY DESC(?count) 
LIMIT 10

dynamic_elements.text: What roles did people linked to music and the city of Bologna played? Characters relevant to the music scene that crossed Bologna over the centuries were mostly authors and artists, but also office holders, writers, agents, and editors. Such insights suggest that Bologna was both a point of reference for artistic production and for music-related activities, as criticism and business. Last but not least, Bologna attracted music students.

dynamic_elements.map_title: Bologna as a lively cultural centre in Europe
dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dul: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/dul/DUL.owl#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX sc: <http://purl.org/science/owl/sciencecommons/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX ps: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/>
PREFIX psv: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/value/>
PREFIX wdr: <http://www.w3.org/2007/05/powder#>
PREFIX amr: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/> 
SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?label ?frameInstance ?lat ?long
WHERE { ?cityUri rdf:type amr:City ;  owl:sameAs ?point ;  amr:name ?label .  
	FILTER (regex(str(?point), "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/", "i"))  
	?frameInstance ?p ?cityUri ; rdf:type ?frame .  
SERVICE <https://query.wikidata.org/bigdata/namespace/wdq/sparql> { 
	?point wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q515 .  
	?point p:P625 ?coords_stmt .  
	?coords_stmt ps:P625 ?coords; 
	psv:P625 [  wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat;  wikibase:geoLongitude ?long ] . }
}

dynamic_elements.text: This map shows that, in MusicBO corpus, may other places throughout Europe are mentioned in relation to Bologna. Unveiling an intricate net of connections, this data underlines Bologna's pivotal role as a pulsating hub within the European music scene.
